Price: $38.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 10:39:25 UTC – Details)

Product Description

Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

Advantage :
1. 180 flip camera
2. Easy to use and carry
3. With 11 funny frames
4. Come with 8GB SD card

Prysyedawn Kids Phone

In order to stimulate children’s desire for exploration and interest in photography, we upgraded the Prysyedawn phone with a new high-definition 180 flip camera configuration. Combining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Small size, easy to carry. suitable for outdoor travel use, allow kids to explore their creativity and curiosity. Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

Specifications :
Display Screen: 2 inch
Battery Capacity: 600mAh
Charging Time: 2-3 Hours
Charging Cable: USB Type-C cable
Support 3.5mm Headphone Jack
System Languages: 20 languages are supported. e.g. English, Spanish, French, Italian, Russian, German, Portuguese, etc.

Cute Stickers and Frames

This toddler phone can be flipped 180 to take cute photos. The sticker camera with 11 cute stickers can choose. Let your little girls get creative by taking photos and the lifetime more interesting.

Wallpapers & Desktop

10 wallpapers, 5 styles of desktop to choose from. Let your child experience the joy of different wallpapers.

Alarm Clock

This phone can teach kids to follow a schedule and develop autonomy by setting alarms to do homework, brush teeth, or go to bed. (only set 4 alarms)

Flashlight

Let the child from being scared when they are in the dark. (Be careful when using the flashlight, Don’t point the light directly at people or animals, as it may cause eye damage.)

4 Funny Puzzle Games

4 Interesting learning games that can develop childrens intelligence and exercise their ability to react and think.

Perfect Gift for Kids Ages 3-6

Kids like taking selfies, videos, large Storage to meet the needs of kids. This Phone toy can store thousands of photos, and kids can recall everything he has recorded! At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. The perfect gift for boys and girls ages 3 4 5 6.

Notice:

1. Do not disassemble the battery.

2. Use the USB cable to connect to the computer. The phone will display charging and the computer will read the disk. You can download photos or music.

3. For adding new music, please confirm the downloaded music is in MP3 format.

4. Our fake phone has no call capabilities, so you dont need to buy a SIM card for this.

Upgraded Toddler Cell PhoneCombining kids phone & MP3 music player to design a role-playing cell phone for toddlers. Equipped with auto Focus, 8.0 Mega pixels and 1080P Video. Greatly improved the definition of photos. With Big head sticker shooting, children can take photos with frames, leave some hilarious photos with family or friends. And it has a high-quality speaker that can support a 3.5mm headphone jack. It is good for children to learn and listen to music.
180 Flip CameraUpgraded to flip-camera configuration, Easy to take selfies. Just open the switch key to enjoy the fun of taking photos. With 10 wallpapers and 5 desktops, kids can switch between their favorite wallpapers. Kids music player Includes a portable lanyard hang, easy to carry and move. Includes a video recorder, Alarm clock, game, and voice recorder for more creative ways to play.
Powerful Battery LifeContinuously taking photos or listening to music for 1-2 hours after fully charged! Come with 1*USB Type-C cable & 1*8GB micro SD card to store thousands of photos!
Safe & Durable ShockproofThis toddler music player is used high quality non-toxic soft plastic, more safe and comfortable for childrens skin. The shockproof shell provides effective anti-fall protection.
Great Gift for KidsPerfect birthday, Christmas, festival, and holiday gifts for boys and girls aged 3~6. Children love taking photo with extremely cute cell phone. Simply capture scene or animals on nature with family, experience the fun from nature. In addition, your child will have their first own fake phone, and you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone again.






Packing list:

1* Kids Phone

1* 8G SD Card

1*Lanyard

1*User Manual

  • Advantage :
  • 1. 180 flip camera
  • 2. Easy to use and carry
  • 3. With 11 funny frames
  • 4. Come with 8GB SD card

Your child will have their first own fake phone, you will never have to worry about your child using your smartphone.

At the same time, you can download music that your child likes to listen to, which helps to develop language and reasoning skills, as well as enhance your child’s memory and creativity. Price: $21.99 - $15.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:53 UTC – Details)


It’s grid-spinning, game-changing fun in this strategy board game of weights and balances! Players choose where to put their disc into the grid, and then spin the column to line them up. They need to get 4 in a row–horizontally, vertically, or diagonally –to win. But they also need to keep an eye out for their opponent’s disc placement before spinning or they might throw them a victory. Each set of discs includes a weighted disc that can change the game in an instant. With 2 game modes, Beginner and Expert, the Connect 4 Spin game is a great choice for a family game night and play dates for kids ages 8 and up. This 2-player game is a fun family and kids gift. Hasbro Gaming and all related trademarks and logos are trademarks of Hasbro, Inc.
FAMILY BOARD GAME FOR KIDS AGES 8 AND UP: Get ready for suspense, strategy, and surprises! The Connect 4 Spin game is the first Connect 4 board game that features a spinning grid
FUN STRATEGY GAME: Pop in a disc and then spin the column. Who knows how the discs will line up? Things can change in an instant while playing this strategic game of weights and balances
4 THE WIN: Strategy is the key but be prepared for surprising wins and swings in gameplay! The first player to connect 4 discs horizontally, vertically, or diagonally wins the game
FEATURES 2 GAME MODES: Players can choose their challenge and play using rules for Beginner Mode or Expert Mode. One of the most exciting 2-player board games, makes a great choice for family gifts.
WEIGHTED DISC: Each color set of discs contains one disc with extra weight. Players can use it at anytime for a strategic advantage
FUN GIFTS FOR KIDS: Strategy Board Games are excellent adult and kids gifts for families that love playing indoor games.


Read more


Spinning Grid!

Get ready for a different Connect 4 gaming experience! Use strategy like never before with this Connect 4 game featuring a spinning grid.

Read more





Get 4 in a Row to Win!

Place a disc anywhere in the grid and then spin that column. But spin strategically because lining up 4 in a row doesn’t count unless the discs still line up after spinning.

Weighted Discs!

Each color set includes a disc with extra weight that players can use to their advantage.

Easy Storage!

Players can conveniently store the game discs right on the game unit, making clean up a breeze.

Unpredictable Gameplay!

Suspense builds throughout this game of weights and balances. Players experience surprising victories and “I nearly had it” losses as they try to figure out which side of the grid will end up on top.

Read more


4.5
Price: $21.99 - $15.97
(as of Nov 30,2022 05:20:53 UTC – Details)

(as of Nov 30,2022 04:30:20 UTC – Details)

Product Description

When 2 people are doing target practice together, it’s easy enough to add up points at the end by checking the pockets, since each person has a different color of ball.

360Rotation Power Popper Guns

Comes with two air powered guns, easy to use and fun. Gun collects air when pushing handle out and uses it to push the ball out when pulling handle in.

Blast Shooting Target Toy

The pump action gun is easy enough for the children to operate. The blast shooting game can play indoor and outdoor, and kids can play with friends and family.

Shooting Range 12 to 15 ft Max

Balls are also soft and light. The balls are not hard, so don’t hurt even if hit in close range. This is nice indoor game for kids.

Perfect Birthday Gift Choice

The shooting game toy is very light-weight, and more over not harmful for small kids. It comes with everything you need for a fun, kid-based shooting range. Party favor gift for any child who’s like fighting game!

Shooting Target Games Kit: Package has a whole setup with shoot range board, 24pcs soft foam balls (2 colors: 12 orange and 12 yellow) and 2pcs Air pump blaster guns. This target practice toy is perfect because it comes with everything you need for a fun and big enough for 2 kids to shoot the targets at the same time.
2-Player Mode Fun Gun Toy: The target board is very light weight and easy to setup and easy to put away as well. The use and operation of the pump action gun is easy enough for the youngest to operate. The power popper gun has 360 degree butt and shoot around 12ft, so much fun shooting at the target and competing for who can get the most shots.
Great Indoor Game for Kids: The guns are easy to load by just pressing the balls by hand into the front where they are shot out of. The foam balls are very light and it is painless when you are hit, very safe for little kids. The balls being two different colors is very helpful so that players can easy enough to add up points and know who will win more scores.
Fun for Kids and Adults: The blast shooting game can play outside or a big basement, and kids can play with friends and family. This toy can shoot quite a distance but are not painful in any way. Perfect for target practice and games, improve hand-eye coordination and fine motor skills. A great well made toy for children of all ages.
Great Idea Gift for Age 5+: It’s a parent-child interactive toy that can reduce kid’s devices time and make fun family time! Highly recommend it if you’re looking for something simple and entertaining that promotes physical activity and can be used indoors or outdoors. The best choice for boys Birthday gift or Christmas gift.

Read more

Warranty & Support

If you’d like a copy of the manufacturer’s warranty for a product found on Amazon.com, you can contact the manufacturer directly or visit their website for more information. Price: $299.00 - $255.46
(as of Nov 30,2022 04:25:56 UTC – Details)


1.SYLVOX 24-inch DC flat-screen TV, built-in DVD player, with a base, and high-resolution digital noise, suitable for RVs travel and home use.
2 .10.5V~28V full range wide voltage protection, which can effectively deal with the influence of unstable power supply voltage in the car on the TV when the RV starts and stops. Support DC voltage 12v/24v power supply, or use the attached adapter to connect to a home AC voltage 110v power supply.
With anti-reverse connection technology, when the positive and negative poles of the DC power supply are reversed, the TV will not be short-circuited, which effectively protects the TV.
3.Built-in dual 5W speaker cabinet , to provide high-quality sound. The square base bracket is earthquake-resistant . Designed for light motorhomes, caravans, motorhomes, boats, bedrooms, kitchens and home use
4 .HDMI and USB port for connection to USB or hard drive for recording and playback program file, or through the HDMI connection VAST box or media player. With a built-in DVD player, you can watch your favorite movies.
5. One-key scanning: Sylvox RV TV can be easily used in mobile environments such as boats and RVs . A simple function- SCAN is added to the remote control . When moving to a new location, just press the “Scan” button, and the TV will pass and retune to the new location and get all the channels in the new area.

We include a 100-240V adapter and a 12V cigarette lighter, so you can power it directly from a 12V socket, or you can power it throgh the adapter in the bedroom, kitchen.
The square base bracket has good shock resistance and can withstand bumps, potholes, and uneven roads.

Specification:
Resolution: 1920 x 1080 HD
Tuner: ATSC
Connection method: USB HDMI VGA
Voltage range: 10.5-28V DC
Aspect ratio: 16:9
Brightness: 220 cd/m2
Wall mount VESA : 100 x 100mm
Product size: 548.78*48.60*366.26mm
Standard: ATSC
Refresh rate: 60Hz
Power: 34w
Viewing angle: 178H/178V
Weight: 3.2Kg
Ports: EARPHONE, DC, HDMI, VGA, PC AUDIO, AV, YPBPR, AUDIO OUT, TV, COAX, USB
Accessories: remote control (including battery), power cable, adapter, square base, screws, manual, cigarette lighter.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.
Multiple Protection Design : Full HD TV support DC 12v/24v (DC wide voltage 10.5V-28V ) power supply, recoil protection (when the voltage changes sharply, it can become flat and will not damage the circuit), reverse connection protection (No short circuit even if the positive and negative terminals are reversed)
Excellent experience: 12 volt TV Built-in DVD, integrated ASTC tuner, with USB, HDMI, VGA port, cabinet speaker, minimal sound staining, reduced distortion, excellent broadband sound effect. 178H/178V ultra-wide viewing angle experience. With square bracket base, cigarette lighter, adapter and other accessories.
Use place: Travel and home Both, suitable for traveling campers with, trailers, RVs and home bedrooms, kitchens, lounges and other places of the perfect TV, through the included adapter to convert the home AC power to DC power to power the TV, thereby achieve home use effect.
Anti-seismic design, passed the 4G vibration test.6 pin DC port Anti-drop design, the plug is not easy to fall in the process of vibration.
High-definition TV: Resolution 1920 x 1080 Full HD picture quality, full high definition LCD TV, ELED backlight, slim and light weight body. High-performance 16 : 9 aspect ratio LCD panel, 8bit color panel with 16.7 million colors.
DVD player supports DVD/VCD/CD discs, does not support playing Blu-ray discs.

SYLVOX

SYLVOX is the brand of an American company that provides quality products and services to tens of millions of users worldwide.

Warranty & Support

Price: $499.00
(as of Nov 29,2022 04:34:41 UTC – Details)


Our Customers asked and Free Signal TV has delivered! The next generation of mobile 12V DC powered high-definition televisions have arrived, featuring built-in Smart TV features that campers, boaters and tailgaters have been asking for! The Transit Platinum 12 Volt TV line offers 22, 28, 32 and 40 high-definition 1080p LED screen sizes with built in Wifi/Internet connectivity and other cutting-edge features like ultra-low power draw, integrated SD-DVD player, easy Bluetooth connectivity, popular apps like Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube and many more. Engineered for long lasting mobile use with vibration resistant chassis and durable 1080p high resolution LED screen. Standard home use televisions dont last in a mobile environment and the Transit Platinum models feature unique Flex-Environment engineering which allows reliable operation across a wide range of temperatures and humidities for reliable use in demanding environments. Manufactured to Free Signal TVs rigid quality control standards and backed by a one-year free replacement warranty an industry first that debuted with the original Transit 12 DC powered TV line. Easy set up and operation, includes 110V optional powerbrick, 12V car charger outlet cord, multi-function one-key command remote, and detailed user manual. Supported by Free Signal TVs top-rated domestic-based Customer Care and Tech Support Teams for assistance with questions and customized set-up applications. Experience the enjoyment, performance and peace of mind that only Free Signal TVs unique Advanced Entertainment Solutions can deliver!
Built in Wifi/Internet Access, Bluetooth Connectivity, Integrated SD – DVD Player.
Preloaded Popular Apps (Netflix, Amazon Prime, YouTube, Pandora & More).
Rugged Vibration Resistant Chassis for Trouble-Free Mobile/Off Road Use.
High-Definition Screen Sizes from 22 to 40. Flex-Environment Engineering – Temperature and Humidity Adaptable.

4
